Pact weapon uses your Charisma modifier.

The weapon returns to its previous state if you are more than [1] away from it for more than 10 rounds.

Bind to your weapon. Its damage becomes magical, you cannot drop or throw it, and you become <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it if you weren't already. When you attack with this weapon, there is a chance that <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HEXBLADES_CURSE">Hexblade's Curse</LSTag> will be applied to the target.
